title: Rocha
body: This family name, as stated by the erudite annotator of 'Saudades da Terra', begins with João Enes Rocha, a noble squire and almoner in Funchal in 1568.

João Enes Rocha: Noble squire and almoner in Funchal in 1568

1568: João Enes Rocha began as a noble squire and almoner in Funchal
